motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • January 27, 2025 meeting minutes • Funding authorization for stormwater repairs at 4425 E Kings Point Circle • Contract amendment No. 3 with Jacobs for Finance and Administrative Services • MOU with US Postal Inspection Service

specialEvents.title: 2024 President's Volunteer Service Awards
specialEvents.description: Recognition of recipients of 2024 President's Volunteer Service Awards for volunteers with 100+ hours of service.
specialEvents.presenter: Chief Carlson and Officer Theresa Hernandez

specialEvents.title: Administration of Oath of Office - Officer John Rose
specialEvents.description: Mayor Deutsch administered oath of office to Officer John Rose.

specialEvents.title: Scout Troop 1818 Recognition
specialEvents.description: Recognition of Scout Troop 1818 members working on merit badges.

discussionItems.title: Contract with Stewart Brothers for 2025 Paving Contract
discussionItems.description: Second year of five-year paving plan. Eight bids received with Stewart Brothers as low bidder at $2,491,439.
discussionItems.recommendation: Staff recommends award to Stewart Brothers
